main event: M/Sgt Ellis C. Stone reported observing a luminous spherical object with a colored trail in the sky near San Antonio, Texas on January 20, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 seconds, traveling from ESE to NNW, The color of the object was described as luminous bluish-green with a yellow tinge, The trail emitted from the object varied in length and color, having pink and red sparks, The observation was made at a point 6.2 miles NE of San Antonio, The object gradually descended in altitude from 15° to 12° before disappearing over a hill.
witness description: M/Sgt Ellis C. Stone, Headquarters Fourth Army, AG Section
